sn16.3:1.3: apakasseva kāyaṃ, apakassa cittaṃ, niccanavakā kulesu appagabbhā.
sn16.3:1.4: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, puriso jarudapānaṃ vā olokeyya pabbatavisamaṃ vā nadīviduggaṃ vā—
sn16.3:1.6: evameva kho, bhikkhave, candūpamā kulāni upasaṅkamatha—
sn16.3:1.7: apakasseva kāyaṃ, apakassa cittaṃ, niccanavakā kulesu appagabbhā.
sn16.3:2.2: apakasseva kāyaṃ, apakassa cittaṃ, niccanavako kulesu appagabbho.
sn16.3:2.5: “Bhagavaṃmūlakā no, bhante, dhammā bhagavaṃnettikā bhagavaṃpaṭisaraṇā. Sādhu vata, bhante, bhagavantaṃyeva paṭibhātu etassa bhāsitassa attho. Bhagavato sutvā bhikkhū dhāressantī”ti.
sn16.3:3.1: Atha kho bhagavā ākāse pāṇiṃ cālesi.
sn16.3:3.2: “Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, ayaṃ ākāse pāṇi na sajjati na gayhati na bajjhati;
sn16.3:3.3: evameva kho, bhikkhave, yassa kassaci bhikkhuno kulāni upasaṅkamato kulesu cittaṃ na sajjati na gayhati na bajjhati:
sn16.3:3.5: yathāsakena lābhena attamano hoti sumano, evaṃ paresaṃ lābhena attamano hoti sumano;
sn16.3:3.6: evarūpo kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu arahati kulāni upasaṅkamituṃ.
sn16.3:4.1: Kassapassa, bhikkhave, kulāni upasaṅkamato kulesu cittaṃ na sajjati na gayhati na bajjhati:
sn16.3:4.4: evaṃ paresaṃ lābhena attamano hoti sumano.
sn16.3:5.2: kathaṃrūpassa bhikkhuno aparisuddhā dhammadesanā hoti, kathaṃrūpassa bhikkhuno parisuddhā dhammadesanā hotī”ti?
sn16.3:5.3: “Bhagavaṃmūlakā no, bhante, dhammā bhagavaṃnettikā bhagavaṃpaṭisaraṇā. Sādhu vata, bhante, bhagavantaṃyeva paṭibhātu etassa bhāsitassa attho. Bhagavato sutvā bhikkhū dhāressantī”ti.
sn16.3:5.4: “Tena hi, bhikkhave, suṇātha, sādhukaṃ manasi karotha, bhāsissāmī”ti.
sn16.3:5.5: “Evaṃ, bhante”ti kho te bhikkhū bhagavato paccassosuṃ.
sn16.3:6.1: “Yo hi koci, bhikkhave, bhikkhu evaṃcitto paresaṃ dhammaṃ deseti:
sn16.3:6.2: ‘aho vata me dhammaṃ suṇeyyuṃ, sutvā ca pana dhammaṃ pasīdeyyuṃ, pasannā ca me pasannākāraṃ kareyyun’ti;
sn16.3:6.3: evarūpassa kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno aparisuddhā dhammadesanā hoti.
sn16.3:7.1: Yo ca kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu evaṃcitto paresaṃ dhammaṃ deseti:
sn16.3:7.2: ‘svākkhāto bhagavatā dhammo sandiṭṭhiko akāliko ehipassiko opaneyyiko paccattaṃ veditabbo viññūhīti.
sn16.3:7.3: Aho vata me dhammaṃ suṇeyyuṃ, sutvā ca pana dhammaṃ ājāneyyuṃ, ājānitvā ca pana tathattāya paṭipajjeyyun’ti.
sn16.3:7.4: Iti dhammasudhammataṃ paṭicca paresaṃ dhammaṃ deseti, kāruññaṃ paṭicca anuddayaṃ paṭicca anukampaṃ upādāya paresaṃ dhammaṃ deseti.
sn16.3:7.5: Evarūpassa kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno parisuddhā dhammadesanā hoti.
sn16.3:8.1: Kassapo, bhikkhave, evaṃcitto paresaṃ dhammaṃ deseti:
sn16.3:8.2: ‘svākkhāto bhagavatā dhammo sandiṭṭhiko akāliko ehipassiko opaneyyiko paccattaṃ veditabbo viññūhīti.
sn16.3:8.3: Aho vata me dhammaṃ suṇeyyuṃ, sutvā ca pana dhammaṃ ājāneyyuṃ, ājānitvā ca pana tathattāya paṭipajjeyyun’ti.
sn16.3:8.4: Iti dhammasudhammataṃ paṭicca paresaṃ dhammaṃ deseti, kāruññaṃ paṭicca anuddayaṃ paṭicca anukampaṃ upādāya paresaṃ dhammaṃ deseti.
sn16.3:8.5: Kassapena vā hi vo, bhikkhave, ovadissāmi yo vā panassa kassapasadiso, ovaditehi ca pana vo tathattāya paṭipajjitabban”ti.
